example_utterances: I just wanted to check in and see how you're feeling about our relationship. I worry that things may be moving too fast and I want to make sure we're both on the same page.
I guess it's just that we've been spending a lot of time together and I don't want us to burn out too quickly. I want to make sure we're building a strong foundation for the future.
I see your point, but at the same time, I don't want to ignore any potential red flags. Can we have open communication about our feelings and concerns?
No, I think I just needed to express my thoughts and make sure we're on the same page. Thank you for listening.
No, that's it for now. But I appreciate your understanding and willingness to talk things through.
I'm just feeling a bit concerned about our relationship. I feel like things are moving too fast and I want to make sure that we're on the same page.
Okay, that's a relief to hear. So, I wanted to talk to you about last night. I was disappointed when you were thrown out of the club.
I know you were looking forward to it. But maybe it was for the best. Going home alone was probably safer for you.
I understand. But I also want you to know that I'm here for you. If you ever need anything, just let me know.
Of course. And speaking of support, I still want to make sure that we're on the same page with our relationship.
